revised_title: The Distribution and Marketing of the First Edition of Newton's Principia
tldr: This article discusses the distribution and marketing of the first edition of Isaac Newton's Principia in 1687. It explores the relationship between the two different title pages and the business arrangements made by Edmund Halley, who oversaw the printing and distribution of the book. The article also highlights the challenges faced in distributing the book without the help of a wholesaler and the impact of these challenges on the book's sales and marketing.
